A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie manages to destroy everything that was good in star wars in 2 hours and 32 minutes. Luke Skywalker doesnt appear in this film at all. Zero screen time. Instead they have some bizzarro Luke Skywalker take his place. Keep the jokes away from this franchise. Too much estrogen just for the sake of it. Not cool! 

The force being available to everyone "is all around us" is not a new concept. Anakin was a slave. Powerful female characters : Ashoka Tano\, Chaak Ti\, Jyn Erso\, Princess Leia. Previous Star Wars movies didn't put down male characters to create strong female roles. Obi-Wan\, Mace Windu\, Anakin\, Luke\, Han Solo.. They can all coexist. Leave the politics propaganda out if the screen. 

No character development\, literally the story didnt move forward at all. These new characters are all trash. None of them are remotely relatable or intriguing. This movue sucks!!!!! Sucks!!! Save your money\, go see Coco instead. Or Jumanji...
